NYC, New York - World on a Hanger - Full time (Rails/Mongo)

I’m looking for an exceptional Rails developer to help build a niche SaaS application within the fashion space. We’re somewhat distributed (between the US and Europe) but the core management and development team will work out of NYC. You should love to build projects from scratch, choosing the right technologies/languages for the job. You should be a little obsessive over user experience and good design and be happy joining an early stage startup. Founded by YC alums.

Email: tom.riley@gmail.com
